title: Close to Shopping & Freeways, On Site Maintenance, Clubhouse
posting_body: Skyline Terrace Apartment Homes is conveniently located in the business and cultural heart of Downtown L.A.
Each of our Los Angeles apartments presents excellent one-bedroom or two-bedroom floor plans.
Beautiful views of the downtown skyline, spacious kitchens, large living and dining areas, and more await you at Skyline Terrace.
From your contemporary hilltop hideaway with sweeping views of the L.A. skyline, the city unfolds before you… and the luxury of Skyline Terrace Apartments surrounds you.
Take in everything that our Los Angeles apartments have to offer.
-Gourmet Kitchens with Built In Whirlpool Appliances
-Tiled Entries, Berber Carpeting and Crown Molding
-Closed-Circuit TV Entry System in Each Apartment Home
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
